channel.title: Help Pl0x0rz

item.title: Help Pl0x0rz
item.dc:creator: @dragx55 dragx55
item.description:
@dragx55 wrote:

Sorry for the caps. I find it interesting that if you have a topic title that makes you look like an idiot, you get more topic views.

Here is what I get from compiling my 525 Server:

It says it “cannot find symbol” but it’s right here:

What did I do?

Here is the block of code that uses “public int castDelay”:

											if (p.barrage == 6 && p.getEquipment().get(3).getDefinition().getId() == 2415) {
												if (p.MDefence(p)) {
													p.animate(811);
                        										p.castDelay = 4;
													if (p2.freezeDelay != 0 && (p.castDelay == 0)) {
													int hitblood = Misc.random(45);
                        										p2.hit(hitblood);
													p.getSkills().addHp(hitblood*2);
													p.sm("You just raped your enemy.");
                        										p2.graphics(76, 0);
													}
													p.animate(811);
                        										p.castDelay = 4;
													}
											if (p2.freezeDelay == 0 && (p.castDelay == 0)) {
													int hitblood = Misc.random(45);
												p2.sm("You have been frozen!");
												p.sm("You rape and freeze the enemy.");
                        									p2.freezeDelay = 30;
                        									p2.graphics(369, 0);
                        									p2.hit(hitblood);
													p.getSkills().addHp(hitblood*2);
												}
												} else {
													p.animate(811);
                        										p.castDelay = 4;
											if (p.castDelay == 0) {
                        										p2.graphics(85, 100);
												}
												}

Read full topic
